mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (user_code, user_name, user_acct, user_password, user_sex, user_phone, user_mail, user_idcard, user_role, is_deleted, create_user, create_time, update_time, last_modified_by, version) values (#{driverCode}, #{driverName}, #{driverAcct}, #{driverPassword}, #{driverSex}, #{driverPhone}, #{driverEmail}, #{driverIdCard}, 3, #{isDeleted}, #{createBy}, now(), now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)

insert into t_driver (driver_code, province_id, city_id, district_id, is_deleted, create_user, create_time, update_time, last_modified_by, version) values (#{driverCode}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{districtId}, #{isDeleted}, #{createBy}, now(), now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
mapper.select: select a.user_code userCode, a.user_name userName, a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_password userPassword, a.user_sex userSex, a.user_phone userPhone, a.user_mail userEmail, a.user_idcard userIdCard, a.user_role, a.is_deleted, a.create_user, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.last_modified_by, a.version from t_sys_user a where a.user_code = #{userCode} and is_deleted = 0
